SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: UPDATE b_product_resources SET Update_Time=NOW() <%=,Product_ID=@@Product_ID@@%> <%=,P_Resources_Name_CH=@@P_Resources_Name_CH@@%> <%=,P_Resources_Name_HK=@@P_Resources_Name_HK@@%> <%=,P_Resources_URL=@@P_Resources_URL@@%> <%=,P_Resources_Type=@@P_Resources_Type@@%> <%=,P_Resources_Status=@@P_Resources_Status@@%> <%=,P_Resources_Seq=@@P_Resources_Seq@@%> <%=,Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@%> <%=,Update_User=@@Update_User@@%> WHERE P_Resources_ID=@@P_Resources_ID@@;

SELECT P_Resources_ID,Product_ID,P_Resources_Name_CH,P_Resources_Name_HK,P_Resources_URL,P_Resources_Type,P_Resources_Status,P_Resources_Seq,Create_Time,Create_UserId,Create_User,Update_Time,Update_UserId,Update_User FROM b_product_resources WHERE 1=1 <%= AND P_Resources_ID=@@P_Resources_ID@@%> <%= AND Product_ID=@@Product_ID@@%> <%= AND P_Resources_Name_CH=@@P_Resources_Name_CH@@%> <%= AND P_Resources_Name_HK=@@P_Resources_Name_HK@@%> <%= AND P_Resources_URL=@@P_Resources_URL@@%> <%= AND P_Resources_Type=@@P_Resources_Type@@%> <%= AND P_Resources_Status=@@P_Resources_Status@@%> <%= AND P_Resources_Seq=@@P_Resources_Seq@@%> <R%= LIMIT @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM b_product_resources WHERE 1=1 <%= AND P_Resources_ID=@@P_Resources_ID@@%> <%= AND Product_ID=@@Product_ID@@%> <%= AND P_Resources_Name_CH=@@P_Resources_Name_CH@@%> <%= AND P_Resources_Name_HK=@@P_Resources_Name_HK@@%> <%= AND P_Resources_URL=@@P_Resources_URL@@%> <%= AND P_Resources_Type=@@P_Resources_Type@@%> <%= AND P_Resources_Status=@@P_Resources_Status@@%> <%= AND P_Resources_Seq=@@P_Resources_Seq@@%> ;
